function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised health of occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing demand-control ventilation systems, enabling changes in outdoor flowrate by the occupants, and utilizing technologies for air purification","Technologies":"Demand-control ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants, building occupants, building users, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Inaccurate HVAC system settings potentially contributing to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised health of occupants","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of HVAC systems, monitoring air quality and ventilation rates, implementing air purification technologies","Technologies":"HVAC maintenance and calibration tools, air quality monitors, air purifiers","People":"HVAC technicians, maintenance personnel, building occupants","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"High sensitivity of HVAC energy consumption to occupant density increasing disease transmission risk","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised health of occupants, higher energy consumption","Mitigation":"Optimizing HVAC energy efficiency, implementing occupancy-based HVAC control, and utilizing energy-saving technologies","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, energy management systems, HVAC control algorithms","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, energy management personnel","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, energy management personnel"}]}
